title: U.S. amb-at-large for religious freedom calls on FM Jilani, FS Qazi
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 23 (APP): United States Ambassadr-at-Large for International Religious Freedom Rashad Hussain called on Foreign Minister Jalil Abbas Jilani and Foreign Secretary Syrus Sajjad Qazi here on Monday.
In a meeting that took place here at the Foreign Office, FM Jilani reiterated Pakistanâ€™s commitment to the protection and promotion of human rights at home and abroad.
Foreign Secretary Qazi shared the policy undertaken to uphold human rights and freedom for all citizens.
